channel.title: Tools on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Tools
item.description: This section provides direct links to all of the interactive exercises referenced within the text, as well as JavaÂ® applet tools and real data relevant to the course’s main concepts, such as “Trussworks,” a matrix analysis tool for truss structures, “Frameworks,” a similar tool for frame structures, and “Steel Sections,” a database of steel beam sections. Interactive Exercises Vector Addition The goal of this exercise is to estimate the resultant of the addition of two vectors.
